title: Non-aural set, Papillons - m 4 rhythmic device

content.prompt: Which of the following terms best describes the rhythmic device employed in measure 4 ?

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in notated music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
